attributes.additional_details: Increase NHS worker's pay rise to a more acceptable amount , by cancelling all Low traffic neighbourhood schemesaand cycle  lanes etc as these that will cause mayhem on our roads. The money saved can go towards the deserving staff of the NHS who have worked hard throughout the covid crisis

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
